about.title: About me
about.description: My name is Diego Garcia, and I'm passionate about shaping the digital landscape. My journey began in 2021 when I tackled the Mision TIC Bootcamp while still in high school. It ignited a spark, and after graduation, I enrolled in Software Analysis and Development at SENA. There, I've delved into the fundamentals ‚Äì requirements engineering, the software development lifecycle, agile methodologies ‚Äì the tools that bring ideas to life. Databases hold a particular fascination for me, offering a structured world for information to thrive. And of course, I'm honing my skills in the essential languages ‚Äì Python, Java, JavaScript ‚Äì the building blocks of the web. My focus is on crafting innovative solutions that leave their mark on the internet.  What areas of the digital world excite you the most?
about.description_2: Fast-forward to today, my main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for a variety of clients.
about.subtitle: Education

1.title: Full-Stack Developer
1.description: I currently lead software development at SuperGIROS.  My role involves driving innovation by creating new solutions and keeping existing software running smoothly. I ensure previously developed software continues to function flawlessly, while also integrating new features to boost operational efficiency. On the technical side, I leverage a versatile technology stack. This includes back-end development using Node.js, Express.js, Java 8, and SpringBoot for microservices, along with front-end development with Angular. To manage data effectively, I utilize both Oracle SQL and MySQL relational databases.  Additionally, I take responsibility for creating Docker images and implementing containerized deployments using Docker for streamlined software delivery.

2.title: Front-End Developer
2.description: As a freelance front-end developer, I collaborate with clients to bring their digital visions to life. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites, ensuring a seamless user experience. My projects range from e-commerce platforms to community-driven chat applications, each tailored to meet the unique needs of my clients. I leverage a variety of technologies, including React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Prisma, to build modern and responsive web applications. My work is characterized by a keen attention to detail, a passion for innovation, and a commitment to delivering high-quality results.

filmpassport.title: Film Passport
filmpassport.description: Film Passport is a web application that allows users to browse popular movies, search for movies, and add movies to their favorites list. Each movie has its own dedicated page with a description, trailer, and recommended similar movies.

why.title: Why I built this project?
why.data: I developed Film Passport to enhance my skills in web development and to create a platform where users can discover and bookmark their favorite movies. This project allowed me to apply my knowledge of React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS in a practical setting.

learned.title: What I learned:
learned.data: Developing Film Passport improved my abilities in creating responsive user interfaces, managing state in React, and optimizing data flow. I gained experience in implementing search functionality, fetching data from an API, and creating a seamless user experience.

bluebyte.title: Bluebyte
bluebyte.description: Bluebyte is an e-commerce website utilizing HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, React.js, React Hooks, Next.js, Sanity, and Stripe. The project features a functional shopping cart, a product quantity selector, and payments made through Stripe.

why.title: Why I built this project?
why.data: Bluebyte was created to deepen my understanding of e-commerce development and payment integration. I aimed to build a functional online store with modern technologies and an intuitive user interface.

learned.title: What I learned:
learned.data: Developing Bluebyte expanded my knowledge of building secure and efficient e-commerce platforms. I gained practical experience in implementing payment gateways, managing state in React, and enhancing the overall user shopping experience.

notewave.title: Notewave
notewave.description: Notewave is your go-to digital hub for capturing and sharing ideas effortlessly. Whether you're a creative thinker or meticulous planner, Notewave adapts to your unique style. It's a blend of organization and creativity designed to simplify your digital life, putting your ideas in the spotlight for the world to see.

why.title: Why I built this project?
why.data: Notewave was born out of a personal need for a versatile note-taking application. I wanted to create a platform that seamlessly combines organization and creativity. This project aimed to simplify digital note-taking and idea sharing.

learned.title: What I learned:
learned.data: Building Notewave honed my skills in creating feature-rich applications. I learned to implement rich text editing, task management features, and responsive design. This project improved my abilities in optimizing user workflows and creating a seamless user experience.

eden.title: Eden
eden.description: Eden is a community-driven chat application built to bring conversations to life in a vibrant virtual space. Connect with friends, share ideas, and explore a new realm of online communication. Join the EDEN experience today!

why.title: Why I built this project?
why.data: Eden was conceived with the goal of creating a dynamic and engaging community chat platform. I wanted to provide users with a vibrant virtual space for meaningful conversations and idea sharing. This project aimed to explore advanced technologies for real-time communication.

learned.title: What I learned:
learned.data: Developing Eden provided me with insights into real-time chat functionality, database management with MySQL and Prisma, and the intricacies of building a community-driven application. I gained experience in optimizing data flow, implementing secure authentication, and fostering user engagement in virtual communities.
